scripts.local-deploy-test: npm run minify && firebase use fonzo-test && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.local-deploy: npm run minify && firebase use fonzo-prod && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.travis-deploy-test: firebase use fonzo-test --token $FIREBASE_TOKEN --non-interactive && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.travis-deploy: firebase use --token $FIREBASE_TOKEN --non-interactive fonzo-prod && firebase deploy --token $FIREBASE_TOKEN --non-interactive --only hosting
